column4: Hi! I have a question: I totally borked my network settings. I installed/removed dhcpd, installed/removed firestarter, and was messing with ifconfig. Suddenly, neither of my eth connections will connect to the internet. they will both resolve a proper IP, but no internet. is there anywhere i can start to fix this?
is there anything in resolv.conf ? that's the dns resolver
pointers to dns servers, more accurately
that was the limit of my networking ideas :)
